attributes.action: Reject calls to open our borders to migrants.
attributes.background:
There is an endless stream of economic migrants and refugees trying to cross Europe to settle in the UK. The government should make it clear that we will not open our borders to them.

Divert money from the foreign aid budget to helping genuine refugees in their own regions.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107142

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
